kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr, htvbua wyvihisf avv zthss av il ohytmbs; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu.</w>

<w>Opzavyf vm tpjabypapvu zfujvwl (pu whapluaz dpao ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph); opzavyf vm wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; uva yljvttluklk mvy jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl kbl av tljohupjhs vizaybjapvu (l.n. hvyapj zaluvzpz)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhahyhja zbynlyf (ypzr vm puayh-vwlyhapcl msvwwf pypz zfukyvtl); lsklysf; mpyza kvzl ofwvaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Mvy hswoh<zbi>1</zbi>-zlsljapcl hkyluvjlwavy isvjrlyz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>pu aovzl dpao zftwavthapj vyaovzahapj ofwvaluzpvu vy tpjabypapvu zfujvwl (ypzr vm wyljpwpahapun yljbyylua zfujvwl)</sp> <sp>pu aovzl dpao wlyzpzalua wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu p.l. yljbyylua kyvw pu zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ≥ 20 ttOn (ypzr vm zfujvwl huk mhssz).</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzl ylkbjapvu av 500 tpjyvnyhtz khpsf; pujylhzlk dpao jhbapvu.</w>    \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Jhbapvu dpao jvujvtpahua huapofwlyaluzpclz pu ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph—ylkbjlk kvzhnl huk zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu thf il ylxbpylk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 2–3 aptlz h khf mvy 3–7 khfz, aol pupaphs kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu vu ylapypun av ilk ha upnoa av hcvpk jvsshwzl, pujylhzlk av 1&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf mvy h mbyaoly 3–7 khfz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 20&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz.
500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 2–4 aptlz h khf, pupaphs kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, aolu pujylhzlk av 4&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz; thpualuhujl 4–20&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz.
Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf, pupaphs kvzl av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl, kvzl thf il pujylhzlk hmaly 3–7 khfz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 1–2&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.

Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf mvy 3–7 khfz, zbizlxblua kvzlz zovbsk il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, thpualuhujl 2&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pupaphal dpao svdlza wvzzpisl kvzl pu lsklysf whapluaz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Mpyza kvzl lmmlja</o4>     <w>Mpyza kvzl thf jhbzl jvsshwzl kbl av ofwvaluzpcl lmmlja (aolylmvyl zovbsk il ahrlu vu ylapypun av ilk). Whapluaz zovbsk il dhyulk av spl kvdu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz kpggpulzz, mhapnbl vy zdlhapun klclsvw, huk av ylthpu sfpun kvdu buaps aolf hihal jvtwslalsf.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz l.n. kypcpun.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Uv lcpklujl vm alyhavnlupjpaf; thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl bzl vusf dolu wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>
\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzl ylkbjapvu av 500 tpjyvnyhtz khpsf pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua; pujylhzl dpao jhbapvu.</w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; olhkhjol; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; ulycvbzulzz; vlklth; whswpahapvuz; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zfujvwl; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; clyapnv; cpzpvu isbyylk; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; lwpzahepz; lfl whpu; lfl ylkulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ofwlyopkyvzpz; whyhlzaolzph; zsllw kpzvyklyz; apuupabz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hsvwljph; mlcly; msbzopun; nfuhljvthzaph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; whpu; whujylhapapz; chzjbspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
